title: A Boys' winter games lesson
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education for children
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Schools - Great Britain
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education and training - Study and teaching

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Physical education for children
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Physical education for children
description: This film shows a typical organised field games lesson for a class of boys aged 11 from an elementary school in a congested area of a big city. The lesson includes Association football and Rugby Touch, together with group practices leading up to these games. Based on British Board of Education Syllabus of Physical Training for Schools, 1933.
